author: cnbc.com
title: Dreyfus High Yield Strategies Fund Declares Dividend
text:
NEW YORK--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- On February 28, 2018, the Board of Trustees of Dreyfus High Yield Strategies Fund (NYSE: DHF) declared from net investment income a monthly cash dividend of $0.0235 per share of beneficial interest, payable on April 2, 2018 to shareholders of record at the close of business on March 15, 2018. The ex-dividend date is March 14, 2018. The previous dividend declared in January was $0.0235 per share of beneficial interest.
